articles.author: Michelle Toh
articles.title: Asia Pacific stocks rise as investor worries about global banking turmoil ease - CNN
articles.description: Stocks in the Asia Pacific region rose Tuesday as concerns about the global banking sector eased in response to a whirlwind of intervention by policymakers and industry players.
articles.content:
Stocks in the Asia Pacific region rose Tuesday as concerns about the global banking sector eased in response to a whirlwind of intervention by policymakers and industry players.
